{{Wired embedded system |brand=HP |model=t5325 |asin=B0030CFC3K |est_release_date=12/09/2009 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=thin client |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=3 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.5 |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88F6281 |cpu1_cspeed=1.2 GHz |fla1=512 |fla1_brand=Samsung |fla1_model=K9F2G08U0B-PCB0 |fla1_num=2 |fla2=1 |fla2_brand=SST |fla2_model=SST25VF0808 |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT29C1G12MAD <!-- 9TG27 D9JMB ? - D9JNB MT29C1G12MADNAJC-75 IT Flash ? --> |ram1_num=4 |ram2=64 |ram2_brand=Samsung |ram2_model=K4T51163QG-HCE6 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=4 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1),, COMA |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E3016 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips= 4-port USB Hub Controller;SMSC;USB2514B;;1;,,, I2C Audio Code & Amplifier;Realtek;ALC5621;;1;,,, PanelLink DVI Transmitter;Silicon Image;Sil1162CSU;;1;,,, Dual Operational Amplifier;Unisonic Technologies;LM358L;;1;,,, VGA Display Adapter;XGI;Volari Z11;XGI, VOLARI-Z11, A2CB-HF;1;,,, SATA SSD 4-Channel Flash Controller;Silicon Motion;SMT2240T;;1;,,, Single Synchronous Step-Down Controller;On Semi;NCP5217;;3;,,, Low Voltage Synchronous Buck Controller;On Semi;NCP1587;;1;,,, 30V N-Channel MOSFET;Vishay Siliconix;Si7326DN;;12;,,, 2A Bus Termination Regulator;Richtek;RT9199;;1; |flags=DVI, Audio in/out (3.5mm), RTC w/ battery backup |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.1.4;MIC v3.4.19-16; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.22;18-2-armel; |tp_firmware=Debian, (5.0.8) |default_ip=acquired via DHCP |default_user=root |oui_eth=F4:CE:46 }} {{TagLine|HP Thin Client}} :[http://h20000.www2.hp.com/bizsupport/TechSupport/DocumentIndex.jsp?lang=en&cc=us&contentType=SupportManual&prodTypeId=12454&prodSeriesId=4063703 Manuals]
2x [[Samsung/Memory|Samsung]] Flash attached via ''[[Silicon Motion]]'' SM2240T SSD Controller. :Graphics provided by ''XGI Volari'' Z11 GPU which uses RAM2.
*[https://habr.com/post/260631/ ''Teardown & HDD Mod'' on '''Habr'''] :CPU: [[Marvell]] 88F6281 @1.2GHz :GPU: ''XGI'' Volari-Z11 (64MB) :Flash: 512MB, RAM: 512MB (DDR2) :Board is tracked for a SATA interface :Runs a custom version of ''Debian Lenny''
